urls.title: MP backs bill to tackle problem of smelly landfill sites blighting lives
urls.description: In the wake of constituency complaints about odour from the Droppingwell Tip, MP Alexander Stafford lhas lodged his support for the introduction of a Ten-Minute Rule Bill, which aims to tackle the problem of smelly landfill sites blighting the lives of residents.

text: Communities are often powerless in the face of distressing and persistent odours from landfill sites and can endure years of problems without sufficient action from the Environment Agency.  Why insufficient action is the question? @Alex_Stafford @EnvAgency https://t.co/rdU1RSV6Wz
